content: Remove the unnecessary files or <1>click here</1> to upgrade your tariff plan.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a button or link that prompts users to remove unnecessary files or upgrade their tariff plan. The text will appear on a screen where user quotas are being managed, encouraging users to take action to manage their files or change their plan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are not standard for rendering. They may cause issues in different rendering engines. Consider using a more standard or platform-specific formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace <1> and </1> with a more appropriate formatting or consider removing them if they are intended for developer use only. If highlighting is desired, consider <span> tags or a CSS class.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are inconsistent. The opening tag uses `<1>` while the closing tag uses `</1>`. This might be a copy/paste error.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent HTML tag usage. For example, use `<1>` and `` throughout, or use a different tag like `` and ``.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are inconsistent. The opening tag uses `<1>` while the closing tag uses `</1>`.  This likely indicates an error during translation or reformatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistency in HTML tags.  Likely should be `<1>` and `</1>` consistently or use a different tag or approach.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are inconsistent. The opening tag uses `<1>` while the closing tag uses `</1>`. This suggests a potential copy-paste or tagging error.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistency in HTML tags. Either use `<1>` for both opening and closing tags, or if a different tag is intended, verify its accuracy and consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are not standard and may not render correctly. They appear to be intended to highlight the 'click here' portion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a different highlighting method or standard HTML tags like <strong> or <em>, or ensure the tags are understood by the rendering system.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are inconsistent. The English uses <1>click here</1> while the Spanish translation uses <1>haga clic aquí</1>. The content should use the same HTML tag.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent HTML tag usage throughout both translations. For example, use `<1>haga clic aquí</1> in the English version to match the Spanish.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag <1> is present in both the English and Finnish versions. This might not be necessary and should be reviewed for relevance in the final product. It's generally best practice to remove these tags during translation to allow for separate styling.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the <1> tags and apply styling separately.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> were maintained in the translation. They should likely be removed or replaced with appropriate formatting if intended to be styled differently.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the HTML tags: "<1>cliquez ici</1>" should be "cliquez ici".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are inconsistent in the English and Armenian translations. The English uses `<1>` and `</1>` while the Armenian uses the same.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistency in the HTML tag used for highlighting or marking the clickable text. For example, use `<1>` and `</1>` in both versions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are identical to the English version. This should be maintained.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the HTML tags remain as <1> and </1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are not standard and appear to be placeholders. They should be removed or replaced with appropriate formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the tags <1> and </1> or replace them with a standard formatting tag like <a> or <strong>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'こちらをクリック' (kochira o kurikku) translates to 'click here', it's a very direct and potentially less natural phrasing in Japanese for this context. A more conversational translation might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing such as 'アップグレードのためこちらをクリック' (apugureedo no tame kochira o kurikku) which translates to 'Click here for an upgrade'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are inconsistent. The opening tag uses `<1>` and the closing tag uses `</1>`. This is likely a tagging error.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the HTML tags match: Use `<1>` for the opening tag and `</1>` for the closing tag consistently.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tag `<1>` is not correctly translated into Lao. It should ideally be preserved or translated appropriately depending on the context.  The original tag structure is missing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review how the `<1>` tags are intended to be handled. If they are meant to be interactive elements, ensure the Lao translation reflects that (e.g., preserving the tag or using a Lao equivalent for clickable elements).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are inconsistent. The opening tag uses `<1>` while the closing tag uses `</1>`. This is likely a formatting error caused by copy/paste or automated translation tools.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Standardize the HTML tags to either `<1>` and `` or another consistent format (e.g., `` and ``)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are inconsistent between the English and Romanian versions. The English uses <1> and </1> while the Romanian uses the same.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent HTML tag usage. Standardize to either <1> and </1> or use a different consistent tag pair.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are not standard and appear to be placeholders. They should be reviewed to ensure they are correctly implemented in the final product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify the intended purpose of the `<1>` and `</1>` tags and ensure they are properly formatted (e.g., <a> or <button> with appropriate attributes).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are inconsistent. The English uses <1>click here</1>, while the Sinhala uses <1> and </1>. This suggests a potential tagging error during translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the HTML tags are consistent with the English source. If the intention is to highlight 'මෙතැන ක්ලික් කරන්න', use the same tags as the English version (e.g., <1>මෙතැන ක්ලික් කරන්න</1>).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'upgrade your tariff plan' is translated as 'aktualizujte svoj tarifný plán'. While 'aktualizujte' can mean upgrade, it's more accurately 'update'. 'Upgrade' implies a better or higher tier plan, which is a more precise translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more precise term for 'upgrade' like 'zvýšte' or 'prejdite na lepší tarifný plán' which implies an improvement or move to a higher tier.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The formatting tags `<1>` and `</1>` are present in both the English and Slovak texts. It's important to verify that these tags are used consistently and correctly in the display or system where the text will be used. This verification isn't within the scope of translation accuracy but needs to be confirmed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify that the use of `<1>` and `</1>` are consistent with the application or platform's requirements.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are inconsistent between the English and Slovenian versions. The English version uses `<1>` and `</1>` while the Slovenian uses the same.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistency in HTML tags.  Maintain `<1>` and `</1>` for both versions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The angle brackets around "click here" are inconsistent with the English source. The English uses `<1>click here</1>`, while the Serbian uses `<1> кликните овде </1>`.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the angle bracket formatting matches the English source: `<1> кликните овде </1>` should be `<1> кликните овде </1>`.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are inconsistent with the English content.  The English uses `<1>` and `</1>`.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change the Serbian translation's tags to `<1>` and `</1>` to match the English source.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` are inconsistent between the English and Turkish versions. The English uses `<1>` and `</1>`, while the Turkish uses the same tags.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent HTML tag usage. Either change the English to use `<1>` and `</1>` or change the Turkish to use `<1>` and `</1>`.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are inconsistent between the English and Ukrainian versions. The English uses <1> and </1> while the Ukrainian uses the same.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent HTML tag usage. If `<1>` is intended, use `<1>` and `</1>` in both versions. If something else was intended, clarify the original intent.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tag <1> is not properly closed/rendered in the translated text. It appears as is.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the HTML tag `<1>` and `</1>` are rendered as a clickable link or button in the UI, and not displayed literally.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "tariff plan" is not accurately translated. "费用版本" (feiyong banben) literally means "fee version" and doesn't convey the meaning of a tariff plan which implies a package or service tier.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 升级套餐 (shēngjí tàocān) - This translates to "upgrade package" or "upgrade plan," which is a more accurate representation of a tariff plan.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1>click here</1> are not standard and should be corrected for consistency and clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The tag should be replaced with standard HTML or markdown for the link, e.g., `<1>点击此处` should be replaced with `点击此处
